title.en: The Respiratory Engine of the Abyss

description.ko: 생물 발광 구조와 액체 빛을 통해 유기적인 생명력을 탐구하며, 심해 속 자연의 리듬미컬한 호흡을 표현합니다.
description.en: An exploration of organic life through bioluminescent structures and liquid light, representing the rhythmic breathing of nature in the deep sea.

prompt: A microscopic, cinematic masterpiece of AURA-7, featuring a giant breathing heart-lung hybrid formed from translucent #7FB069 emerald moss and #2D5A3D vascular vines. The entity is suspended in a deep #2D5A3D underwater trench, pulsing with rhythmic #FFE66D liquid sap. Intense subsurface scattering on the mossy membranes creates a soft, living glow. Surrounding the structure are drifting #E6F2E1 bioluminescent spores and wispy glowing tendrils swaying in a slow current. Rendered in Unreal Engine 5 with Octane Render, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic fluid dynamics of liquid light, volumetric light shafts piercing the dark water, focusing on the microscopic texture of the breathing light of nature.
